mapper.select: select count(*) from BI_BOARD order by BOARD_NO desc

select BOARD_NO, CATE_NO, EMP_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_FLAG, BOARD_UPDATER, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE from ( select A.*, row_number() over (order by BOARD_NO desc) rn from BI_BOARD A
) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex} order by BOARD_NO desc
